name: 萨蒂瓦·维特
introduction: Gorgeous and slender brunette knockout Sativa Verte hails from Youngstown, Ohio. Sativa, also known as Lisa Marie Fontanarosa, graduated from high school with honors. At age fourteen Verte left home and moved to New York City, where she initially worked two jobs in order to keep herself afloat. Sativa started modeling in May, 2003. Verte first began performing in explicit hardcore movies in 2007; she has primarily appeared in X-rated features for the company Kick Ass Pictures. Moreover, Verte has not only worked as a promotional model, but also graced the cover of the March, 2006 issue of Fast Lane Biker New Jersey and was named Miss High Times in the July, 2008 issue of High Times magazine.
